thread.title: UAE martyr's daughter recites poem to Sheikh Mohamed
thread.title_full: UAE martyr's daughter recites poem to Sheikh Mohamed

title: UAE martyr's daughter recites poem to Sheikh Mohamed

persons.name: shaikh mohammed bin rashid al maktoum

text: At the family's abode, the daughter of the Sergeant Beloushi approached the Crown Prince to present a poem. You can watch the poetic presentation in the video below. A post shared by UAE Royal Family ???? (@emiratesroyalfamily) on Feb 25, 2017 at 8:02am PST The daughter's poem talks about a conversation she once had with her father about his service. The daughter proudly recites how her father was committed to raising the UAE flag while on tour of duty. She also talks about how her father is confident in the UAE's leadership under The President, His Highness Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan and His Highness Shaikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Vice-President and Prime Minister of the UAE and Ruler of Dubai. Share
